info.title: Mailsquad
info.description: MailSquad offers an affordable and super easy way to create, send and track delightful emails.

get.description: Get a paged result of contacts from a list

parameters.name: listid
parameters.description: Unique 16 characters ID of the contact list to get contacts of

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of items in page

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Property to sort by. Append '-' for descending order.

post.description:
Subscribe an email address to a list. This api call has the same behavior as
a regular subscribe form. However, single opt-in is allowed for system integration
purposes.

- If email address does not exist, a new contact will be added to the list.
- If email address exists custom fields will be updated and status will be put
  to unconfirmed or active depending of singleoptin value.
- If current status if Active, this operation will only update the custom fields.
- If singleoptin is true, no email confirmation will be sent. In that case,
  you must provide the subscribe's origin ip and confirmation date-time.

parameters.name: listid
parameters.description: Unique 16 characters ID of the contact list

clientid.description: Unique 16 characters ID of the client owner

confirmed.description: Date+time subscriber confirmed his/her list opt-in

customfields.description: Dictionnary of field key to value

fullname.description: Full name (Last name, First Name) of the subscriber

ip.description: Subscriber's IP address when he/she confirmed list opt-in

lang.description:
ISO 639-1 language code of the subscriber. When lang is one the supported system language, all communication
will be in this language.

listid.description: Unique 16 characters ID of the list owner

status.description:
Status (
  1- Active,
  2- Unconfirmed,
  3- Unsubscribed,
  4- Deleted,
  5- Cleaned because of hard bounce or spam complaint)

confirmed.description: Date+time subscriber confirmed his/her list opt-in

customfields.description: Dictionnary of field key to value

ip.description: Subscriber's IP address when he/she confirmed list opt-in

listid.description: Unique 16 characters ID of the list owner

status.description:
Status (
  1- Active,
  2- Unconfirmed,
  3- Unsubscribed,
  4- Deleted,
  5- Cleaned because of hard bounce or spam complaint)

key.description: equivalent to html form input name attribute

label.description: User friendly label describing the field

type.description:
Type (
  1- String / text free form
  2- Numeric / integer or decimal
  3- Date / ISO 8601 format (YYYY/MM/DD)
)

clientid.description: Unique 16 characters ID of the client owner

redirecturl.description: full url of the destination landing page

type.description:
Type (
  1- Subscribe confirmation request landing page
  2- Subscribe opt-in landing page
  3- Unsubscribe confirmation landing page
)

page.description: Array of ContactList for that page

total.description: Total number of items in query

page.description: Array of Contact for that page

total.description: Total number of items in query

confirmed.description: Date+time subscriber confirmed his/her list opt-in

customfields.description: Dictionnary of field key to value

ip.description: Subscriber's IP address when he/she confirmed list opt-in

status.description:
Status (
  1- Active,
  2- Unconfirmed,
  3- Unsubscribed,
  4- Deleted,
  5- Cleaned because of hard bounce or spam complaint)

confirmed.description: Date-time when subscriber opted-in. Required if singleoptin is true.

fullname.description: Full name (Last name, First Name) of the subscriber

ip.description: Origin Ip of the subscriber when he/she opted-in. Required if singleoptin is true.

lang.description:
ISO 639-1 language code of the subscriber. When lang is one the supported system language, all communication
will be in this language.

singleoptin.description:
If true, no email will be sent asking user subscription confirmation. In that case, you must provide
the confirmation date (confirmed) and origin ip (ip) manually.
